Posts.Content: Cancersux1990 wrote: My mother has been taking Ibrance for a few months now and its going great...actually shrinking some of her lymph nodes! Well the people at Ibrance noticed and like how well she is doing and decided to shoot a commercial/documentary on my mother and my family! I guess there vision is to show and give people with stage 4 cancer hope that they can live a productive normal life!While the cancer is in all of our minds all day...we are trying to live a "new normal" life... My mother is strong and she actually looks better than ever! You would never tell she is battling such a stressful and harsh sickness! Since her cancer came back in Jan. we have had a lot of opportunities. I will be sharing the documentary on here once they let us see the final product! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Ibrance Cancersux1990 Lynnwood1960

Posts.Content: Cancersux1990 wrote: I posted a couple days ago about my mom finding swollen lymph nodes in her abdomen..well it is stage 4 Breast cancer...we didn't want to believe it but we did expected it...It just sucks now because we don't know what happens now or what we do...we are scared and confused..she is not going to have chemo. She will be doing some sort of injections... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Well...bad news Cancersux1990 RonnieKay

Posts.Content: Cancersux1990 wrote: Has anyone has weight loss surgery with stage 4 breast cancer? We are looking into for my mom. We know losing weight will help her overall, but we don't know if doctors will even let it be done...? Anyone has experience with this? Log in to post a reply
